title: Loving Hut
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian
description: Opened May 2015, a outlet of the fast growing international vegan restaurant chain inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individually owned. Makes a mix of Asian dishes like rice and noodles with mock meats as well western like veggie burgers, chocolate mousse, and tiramisu.
